name: Expert Scroll Cache
summary: Your scroll collection is more powerful.
description:
Your scroll collection is more powerful. In addition to your daily scrolls from Basic Scroll Cache, add a scroll with a 3rd-level spell. At 14th level, add a scroll with a 4th-level spell. At 16th level, add a scroll with a 5th-level spell.Expert Scroll Cache Leads To...

Master Scroll CacheTraitsArchetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
